scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w backend && npm run lint:fix -w frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w backend && npm run type-check -w frontend
